Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Tuhada pujanayoga ika alaha hi hai, para jihare uha hakara karade hana
Alaha nisacita taura janada hai jo kujha uha nu pasada nahim karada
Ate jadom unham nu kiha jave ki tuhade raba ne ki ciza utari hai tam uha kahide hana ki iha guzare ho'e lokam di'am kahani'am hana

Tam ki uha ki'amata de dina apana bhara vi utha'una ate unham lokam da bhara vi, jinha nu binam kise gi'ana de uha gumaraha kara rahe hana. Yada rakho uha bahuta bura bhara hai jisa nu uha cuke rahe hana
